page.title: 21Priorslee Hall - Update
page.content: The Hall was sold by Telford Development Corporation to the University of Wolverhampton, and the building became the foundation of a new 'Telford Campus Site.' The former prefabricated buildings built in the grounds by the Corporation have now been replaced by a range of well designed brick built lecture theatres, campus buildings and accomodation blocks. Students are from UK and overseas.
